data.name: Project_Motor_Racing
data.value:
Project Motor Racing

Was the principle AI programmer for this new Racing IP.

Set up an advanced AI racing solution in Unreal Engine as well as navigation tracking and authoring tools.

Mid way through the project, ported the code into the Giants Engine and set up tools for live tuning and modding.

"Project Motor Racing" is a recently released sim racing video game developed by Straight4 Studios and published by GIANTS Software. It is considered a spiritual successor to the Project CARS series, developed by many of the same key individuals

Reviews :
Hoping to get better reviews in the upcoming updates.

data.name: Project_Motor_Racing_extra
data.value:
Trailer 1
Trailer 2
Dev Diary 1
Gameplay 2
Gameplay 3

data.name: Lap_Of_Legends
data.value:
Lap Of Legends

Participated in setting up the AI code to portray classic racers to compete agaisnt Logan Sargent on an F1 TV Show.

"Lap of Legends" is a 2024 television special and innovative sports event created by Michelob ULTRA and Williams Racing that featured the first-ever real-vs.-virtual Formula 1 race.

The event pitted current F1 driver Logan Sargeant against AI-powered augmented reality (AR) avatars of six legendary Williams Racing drivers.

Reviews :
IMDB Score:9.6/10,

data.name: Lap_Of_Legends_extra
data.value:
Trailer
Behind the Scenes

data.name: Asphalt_7_-_Heat
data.value:
Asphalt 7 : Heat is the follow up to Adrenaline.

Heat had a much larger team allowing me to focus mostly on Artificial Intelligence and Gameplay.

Reviews :
IGN Score:8/10, Metacritic Score:83/100, WIRED Score:6/10, c|net Score:4/5, Excellent, Pocket Gamer Score:8/10, Silver Award

data.name: Unanounced_IOS_Racer
data.value:
Unreleased.

Extended the Vehicle AI systems with a lot more capabilities and optimizations.

data.name: Dungeon_Hunter_5
data.value:
Dungeon Hunter 5 is a 2015 hack and slash role-playing game developed and published by Gameloft.

I worked on Havok Physics work, Pipeline Tools with a bit of Gameplay.

data.name: Unanounced_IOS_Unreal_Game
data.value:
Unreleased.

I was involved in AI and building a new Unreal IOS based Game Engine

data.name: Fast_Five_the_Movie_-_Official_Game
data.value:
Fast Five the Movie: Official Game is a racing video game developed and published by Gameloft for Android, iOS, J2ME and MacOS.

I assisted remotely their Artificial Intelligence team to work on their AI system as the team on this project decided to use Asphalt 6's system as a base for their game.

data.name: Asphalt_6_-_Adrenaline
data.value:
Asphalt 6 : Adrenaline is a 2010 Gameloft Action-Racing game.

I was one of the two programmers who were part of this project from start to finish so I had big responsibilities such as designing and implementing a racing AI system that was then used in multiple other racing projects and a lot of other core engine systems ranging from Main-loop code, Hud Interface, Gameplay systems, Animated environments and pickables, Controls, and Menus.

Reviews :
IGN Score:7.5/10,
Metacritic Score:78/100,
WIRED Score:8/10,
Slide to Play Score:3/4, Good,
Pocket Gamer Score:9/10, Gold Award

data.name: Asphalt_6_-_Adrenaline_extra
data.value:
Trailer 1
Trailer 2

data.name: GT_Racing_-_Motor_Academy
data.value:
GT Racing : Motor Academy is a 2010 racing video game, developed and published by Gameloft as part of the GT Racing series.

My first project in the Gameloft Montreal Studio, worked mostly on menus, push notifications and debugging.

Reviews :
IGN Score:8.5/10, IGN Editor's choice Award,
Touch Arcade Score:4/5 Stars,
iLounge Score:B, Recommended,
Know Your Mobile Score:4.5/5 Stars,
Slide to Play Score:3/4, Good,
Pocket Gamer Score:8/10, Silver Award

data.name: GT_Racing_-_Motor_Academy_extra
data.value:
Trailer 1
Trailer 2

data.name: My_Hero-_Astronaut
data.value:
VG Creator was a short lived studio that suffered like so many others from the hardships of 2008. Their best known work is Horse Life for the Nintendo DS.

My Hero: Astronaut was to be released by Majesco in the US as a 3D space exploration game for Nintendo DS. The game had been anounced and and had been presented at the 2009 E3. It was however cancelled due to lack of funding.

I was main programmer on this project which required the building of a brand new game engine on top of the company's base library wrapper of the Nintedo DS functions.

data.name: My_Hero-_Astronaut_extra
data.value:
Trailer
(From 0:40 to 1:00)

data.name: Crash_of_the_Titans
data.value:
Crash of The Titans This J2ME Midp 2.0 Beat Them Up game developed by the French company DeValley Entertainment.

I worked mostly on HUD, a dialogue engine, and general debugging.

Reviews :
Pocket Gamer.co.uk Score:5/10
Mobile Game FAQs Score:85/100
IGN Score:6/10

data.name: Holy_Wars
data.value:
Holy Wars is J2ME Midp 2.0 Beat Them Up game developed by the French company DeValley Entertainment is was one of their most successful titles.

I was put in charge of porting and resolving a lot of device specific bugs as we then covered about 650 different Java devices.

Reviews :
Pocket Gamer.co.uk Score:6/10

data.value:
Trailer
Gameplay

data.name: Landers
data.value:
Landers is J2ME Midp 2.0 Shoot Them Up game developed by the French company DeValley Entertainment is one of my favorite mobile games.

I assisted on this project by adding a score crypting component and an associated website.
The game features an amazing soundtrack for a cell phone game, fast paced action and addictive gameplay.

Reviews :
Pocket Gamer.co.uk Preview
Project Next Score : 90/100, Next Approved Award

data.name: Landers_extra
data.value:
Trailer
Gameplay

data.name: Nowhere
data.value:
Nowhere is a J2ME Midp 2.0 Survival Horror Game developed by the French company DeValley Entertainment.

I was the lead programmer for the development of this project and worked on some of the porting.
The goal was to create a very disturbing atmosphere, just like the feeling that can be experienced when watching a classic horror movie.
The game was also nominated for two awards at the Festival du Jeu Vidéo 2007 in France, for Best Scenario and Best Mobile Game.

Reviews:
Hardcore Gaming review
Pocket Gamer.co.uk Score : 7/10, Bronze Award
Midlet-Review Score : 9/10, Mobile Game Award
Mobile Game FAQs Score : 82/100, Silver Award
Project Next Score : 89/100, Next Approved Award

data.name: Nowhere_extra
data.value:
Trailer
Gameplay

data.name: Spooks_the_Mobile_Game
data.value:
Spooks The Mobile Game is a J2ME Midp 2.0 Click and Play Game developed by Gameloft New York, based on the adventures of the British TV MI5 spies.

I helped the Lead game designer with scripting while I also helped the two programmers debug the game before going gold.

Reviews :
Pocket Gamer.co.uk Score : 7/10, Bronze Award

data.name: Spooks_the_Mobile_Game_extra
data.value: Gameplay

data.name: The_Spiderwick_Chronicles
data.value:
The Spiderwick Chronicles is a J2ME Midp 2.0 Adventure Game developed by the French company DeValley Entertainment .

I was the lead programmer for the development of this project.
This game was created in anticipation of the Paramount movie and was a licensed product designed to target the same audience that the movie and Tony DiTerlizzi and Holly Black's novels.

Reviews :
Pocket Gamer.co.uk Score : 7/10, Bronze Award

data.value:
Trailer
Gameplay

data.name: Project_CARS
data.value:
Project CARS is a sim racing video game series developed by Slightly Mad Studios and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.

I joined the team to take over the Driver Racing AI duties within the Physics Engineering team.

Reviews :
Metacritic Score:83/100

data.name: Red_Bull_Air_Race_-_The_Game
data.value:
Red Bull Air Race is a flight simulation that replicates the action of the real life Red Bull Air Races.

I worked on the navigation and replay systems as well as fligth AI used for debugging purposes.

Reviews :
redbull.com

data.name: Project_CARS_2
data.value:
Project CARS 2 is a multiple award winning and top selling Motorsport Racing Simulator released in 2017 by Slightly Mad Studios.

Incremented on the AI functionality from Project CARS to improve overtaking and inputs. Also added AI for extra game modes like Oval Racing, Kart and Rallycross (drifting).

Reviews :
WIRED 2017 Best Racing Game

data.value:
Trailer 1
AI review

data.name: Aim_Lab_-_Creator_Studio
data.value:
Aim Lab is an Aim Trainer helping everyone from casual to pro players. Using customizable tasks, scenarios and built in analysis tools, Aimlabs can help players warm up, improve or rank up on the Aimlabs leaderboards.

During my time at Statespace, I mainly worked on Creator Studio, an ingame editor that lets users build training tasks in Aim Lab from scratch. They can create custom maps and bots which have various behaviors and custom pathing.

Reviews :
PC Gamer
Aimprac
Metacritic Score: 6.4

data.name: Aim_Lab_-_Creator_Studio_extra
data.value:
Trailer
Gameplay

data.name: Echo_VR_(Maintenance)
data.value:
Echo VR is game-studio Ready At Dawn's fast-paced first-person competitive multiplayer game where players control robotic Echo-Units to face off in zero-gravity environment. A full-contact sport, players use the Oculus Touch platform to grab, punch, glide, and boost their way around the virtual arena in an attempt to get the disc into the opponent's goal.

I joined Ready At Dawn during the final year of Echo VR's support, as such I mainly worked on bug fixing and support while learning the RAD Engine. I did lead a project to revamp Goal Validation to make it more multiplayer reliable.

data.name: Echo_VR_(Maintenance)_extra
data.value:
Trailer
Gameplay

data.name: Fast_and_Furious_Crossroads
data.value:
Fast and Furious Crossroads is a racing and action role-playing video game based on the Fast and Furious film franchise. It was developed by Slightly Mad Studios, a subsidiary studio of the British developer Codemasters, and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.

I unfortunately did not see this project through, but had enough time to port our simulation AI into it as well as implement a new Traffic Car system.

data.name: Fast_and_Furious_Crossroads_extra
data.value:
Trailer
Gameplay

data.name: OOTP_GO
data.value:
Out Of The Park Baseball is a text-based baseball simulation for career, historical, and fictional play.

During my time at OOTP I assisted in making a mobile version of the highly successful PC game as well as explored an American football project.

data.name: OOTP_GO_extra
data.value:
Trailer
Gameplay

data.name: Unanounced_VR_Title
data.value:
Ready At Dawn Project is not something I can comment on, but I will link this article that suggests that RAD is “in the early stages of working on new, exciting projects and can’t wait to share more information about them in the future.”

During my time on this project, I worked in both Multiplayer and Enemy Combat/Enemy AI pods.

data.name: World_of_Speed
data.value:
World of Speed was a massively multiplayer online action racing video game initially developed by Slightly Mad Studios and My.com and subsequently by Saber Interactive, for the PC platform.

We were leveraging our SMS tech into this ambitious massive multiplayer project. I was in charge of supporting the Driving AI.

Reviews :
MMOS.com Score:3.29/5
